title: Diddy Can’t Be Sued Over Alleged Rapes From the 1990s, Judge Says
description: The ruling significantly narrows the claims of April Lampros, who was the seventh alleged victim to sue the rapper last year.
author: Rachel Scharf

title: NIVA Says Live Nation a Bigger Threat to Indie Venues Than Scalpers in Letter to FTC, DOJ
description: In its own letter to the federal agencies, Live Nation refuted NIVA's claims, instead calling for a crackdown on the secondary ticketing business.
author: Dave Brooks

title: Nostalgia Takes Over the Dancefloor in Andrew Dum's "Changes" With Eran Hersh and Alina Eremia
description: Reimagining Chris Lake's timeless track "Changes," the group have delivered a soul-stirring Afro-house track.
author: EDM.com Staff

title: Martin Garrix, Tiësto and More Confirmed to Headline Inaugural Breakaway NorCal Festival
description: Sacramento's festival scene has operated in the shadow of coastal giants for years, until Breakaway decided shadows make excellent places to plant flags.
author: EDM.com Staff

title: 70000TONS OF METAL Changes Course For 2026 Cruise, Drops First Lineup Wave Featuring INSOMNIUM, ELUVEITIE & More
description: The cruise includes Amorphis, Dark Tranquillity, Dødheimsgard, Eluveitie, and way more! The post 70000TONS OF METAL Changes Course For 2026 Cruise, Drops First Lineup Wave Featuring INSOMNIUM, ELUVEITIE & More appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty

title: Unhinged Festival Cancelled, New Shows Booked In The Denver Area Feat. THE DILLINGER ESCAPE PLAN, POWER TRIP, SANGUISUGABOGG & More

title: Dion Brant appointed President and CEO of AEG Presents Asia Pacific
description: Brant will report to Adam Wilkes, President and CEO of AEG Presents Europe and Asia Pacific Source
author: Daniel Tencer

title: Fictional K-pop groups from Netflix’s ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ dominate streaming charts
description: The film's two virtual bands collectively attracted over 25 million monthly listeners on Spotify. Source
author: Mandy Dalugdug

title: Apple iPad Deals for Prime Day 2025: Save Up to $120
description: The entry-level model, iPad mini, iPad Air, and iPad Pro are all on sale. Apple iPad Deals for Prime Day 2025: Save Up to $120 Eddie Fu

title: Ryan Murphy Developing Monster Season 4 About Lizzie Borden: Report
description: The accused axe murderer is yet to be cast. Ryan Murphy Developing Monster Season 4 About Lizzie Borden: Report Liz Shannon Miller

title: Annahstasia Details European Tour, Shares Video for “Be Kind”: Watch
description: The Los Angeles-based singer-songwriter released her debut studio album, Tether, last month

title: Jim Legxacy Announces Release Date for Long-Teased Black British Music (2025) Mixtape
description: The British musician’s first project for XL Recordings lands on July 18
